participant_1.background:

not a day goes by that i do not drink four mountain dews.

My weight is not something that I want to discuss.

participant_2.background:
I have a classic car that my friends love to ride in when we go out.
i am a childrens librarian.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
I have a Honda Civic Hybrid because it's fuel-efficient and spacious enough for my sister and me to explore new places.
i am a closet cannibal.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
Pretty good, just got back from spending some time with my friends.
Oh, that sounds nice. What did you all do?
We went to a local coffee shop and just chatted for a while.
That sounds fun. Do you go out to coffee shops often?
Not as often as I'd like to, but it's always a nice way to spend some time with friends.
I agree. I love to get a good cup of coffee and read a book.
That sounds like a great way to relax.
It is. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, cook, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I love to read and cook too.
What do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I'm really into historical fiction and fantasy novels.
Those are both great genres. I love to read fantasy novels too.
That's great. What's your favorite fantasy novel?
I have a few, but one of my favorites is the Mistborn series by Brandon Sanderson.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should. It's a really good series.
I'm glad you liked it. I'll have to add it to my reading list.
You won't be disappointed
